full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Four Channels Optical Phase Modulator and Accessories

### Reference Number: PW-23-01023798

### Solicitation Number: 2023-14281

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing this request for the procurement of a Four Channels Optical Phase Modulator and Accessories, as part of their laboratory and scientific equipment requirements.

### Notice Details:
* Date of Publication: January 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 13, 2023 14:00:00
* Tender Status: Exired

### Supply Arrangement Requirements:
This request is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI. Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on this arrangement have been invited to bid.

### Contract Requirements:
* Quantity: 1 unit
* Duration: From contract award to March 31, 2023
* Time Frame of Delivery: From contract award to March 31, 2023

### Mandatory Technical Criteria:

* The supplier must be qualified under the Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Selection Criteria:
The responsive bidder who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

### Trade Agreements:
This contract is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity:
This contract is limited to the province of Quebec (except National Capital Region).

### Regions of Delivery:
This contract is limited to the province of Quebec (except National Capital Region).

### Contracting Entity:
The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence (DND), located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2.

### Contact Information:
Marie-Claude Rose, Department of National Defence
marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca
418-844-4000
